content: 2 double_crochet into corner space ch1 1 single_crochet into the top chain of ch3 last corner space total 476 st 4 ch2 corner space round 39 repeat round 35 total 492 st 476 bpdc 16 half_double_crochet 4 ch2 corner space round 40 repeat round 36 total 500 st 492 btsc 8 single_crochet 4 ch2 corner space round 41 repeat round 37 total 516 st 4 ch2 corner space round 42 repeat round 38 total 532 st 4 ch2 corner space continue the pattern to be as big as you want by repeating rounds 35 through 38 finish your creation with round of double_crochet like round 37 and add a border if you wish if you add shell border as per sample you can decorate it with a surface slip_stitch into the top of each stitch extended variation no 2 added 26/03/2019 continuing repeating the pattern not plain rounds round 38 - repeat round 18 just in the corner spaces make 3dc ch2 3dc instead of 2dc ch2 2dc in the corner and 1 double_crochet in ch1 space that we had after and before corner pop on round 18 round 39 - repeat round 19 round 40 - repeat round 20 round 41 - repeat round 21 the next set of rounds will be 42-45 on round 42 we reduce amount of shells -1 on each side of the square as we did on round 22 continue the logic of the pattern till you are happy about the size of your blanket the written pattern is available on ravelry you can use the pattern to create any item you want and sell your finished item if you wish but you have no right to claim that this pattern is created by you neither to sell the pattern nor to share the file of the written pattern free when sharing your creation on a social media facebook instagram etc please add the link to the pattern on ravelry or use #liveadream and #bebablanket thank you the pattern is created by bebablanket january 2019 edited 26/03/2019 https //beba-blanket weebly com/ ♡ https //linktr ee/bebablanket ♡ 8
